actions.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 320 High Street in Clinton, Massachusetts, as the "Raymond J. Salmon Post Office."

summary.text: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 320 High Street in Clinton, Massachusetts, as the "Raymond J. Salmon Post Office."
